column3: Midnight gettin' uptight Where are you
column4: 午夜时分 气氛正好而你在哪里？
column5: You said you'd meet me now it's quarter to two
column6: 你说会来找我 但此时此刻已经一点四十五分
column7: I know I'm hangin' but I'm still wantin' you
column8: 我明白自己犹豫不决 但我依然需要你
column9: Hey Jack It's a fact they're talkin' in town
column10: 嘿 杰克 人们真的议论纷纷
column11: I turn my back and you're messin' around
column12: 我置若罔闻 你却越闹越大
column13: I'm not really jealous don't like lookin' like a clown
column14: 我不是真的吃醋 只是不想被人当小丑看待
column15: I think of you ev'ry night and day
column17: You took my heart then you took my pride away
column18: 你带走了我的心 然后又夺走了我的尊严
column19: I hate myself for loving you
column21: Can't break free from the the things that you do
column22: 无法从你的所作所为中泰然自若
column23: I wanna walk but I run back to you that's why
column24: 我曾经离开 却又回到你身边
column25: I hate myself for loving you
column26: 那就是我恨自己爱上了你的原因
column27: Daylight spent the night without you
column28: 白天了 我没有你而过了一晚
column29: But I've been dreamin' 'bout the lovin' you do
column30: 但我一直梦想着你的爱
column31: I won't be as angry 'bout the hell you put me through
column32: 你对我那么糟 但我已经没那么生气了
